resources.string: The configuration files will be pulled every half hour and then be stored locally. The values stored locally can be obtained by using the ConfigService.getConfig(key) function. Currently, the following keys in the test demo are available: \n test1, test2, test3
Enter the key value configured in the background

After the button is tapped, the function mConfigService.loadConfigImmediately(0) will be executed and the latest configurations on the servers will be pulled immediately. After the configurations are modified on the backend, the latest values will be returned after this API is called.
Monitor the changes of a group of key values. When the configured value of the monitored key changes, the monitor will be notified.
Monitor the changes of TEST1 configuration
Redirect the page according to the switch configuration
Switch configuration test: key = test1. If the value contains A, it will be redirected to page A. If the value contains B, it will be redirected to page B.
